name: Good Luck Valley
description:
This is a demo for Good Luck Valley, a singleplayer, 2D puzzle-platformer in which the player takes the role of Anari, a young girl who finds herself in a mystical spirit world during a complicated time in her life. Traverse the spirit world’s unusual terrain via your magical bouncing mushrooms to get home safely and unveil the truth about this mysterious world.
